page.title: 06 LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: For leisure,people do a lot of things in our village.Some do things such as cricket,football,swimming, cubs, scouts,brownies,guides,youth club,drama and many like to watch television.A few people do judo karate and other martial arts. In Betley there are cricket and football clubs which a lot of the boys take part in.There is a swimming club in Nantwich of which a lot of girls and boys from the area are members. There are sometimes discos,at school or at the village hall.There is an amatuer dramatics club called the B.A.T.S,(Betley Amateur Theatrical Society).Badminton is a very popular sport for adults and the badminton club meets several times a week in the village hall.
